definition: brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]

sentences.english: We independently developed the drum dryer to mention quality oxygen-free lignite.
sentences.chinese: 我們自主開發研製的滾筒式無氧褐煤提質乾燥機。

sentences.english: Lignite oil is creosote derived from lignite tar.
sentences.chinese: 褐煤油是從褐煤中得來的防腐油。

sentences.english: Lignite oil is creosote derived from lignite tar.
sentences.chinese: 褐煤油是從褐煤中得來的防腐油。

sentences.english: Discussion on the superiority in development of lignite gasification in Dayan Coal Industry Corp.
sentences.chinese: 大雁煤業公司發展褐煤氣化的優勢探討。

sentences.english: Lignite, whether or not agglomerated, excluding jet.
sentences.chinese: 褐煤，不論是否製成型，但不包括黑玉。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a multi-effect superheated steam lignite predrying system.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型公開了一種多效過熱蒸汽褐煤預乾燥系統。

sentences.english: Two kinds of new determination methods of germanium in Xilinguole League lignite were established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了兩種測定錫盟鍺礦褐煤中鍺的新方法。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the slurryability of Yunnan lignite-water-slurry.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種雲南褐煤水煤漿的成漿性能。

sentences.english: The most common of these are wood, coal, lignite, and coconut shell.
sentences.chinese: 其中最常見的有木材，煤，褐煤，椰子殼。

sentences.english: It is the unsolidified sediment consisting of disordered kaolinite and small amount organic matter and lignite materials.
sentences.chinese: 常含少量有機質或與褐煤礦層等伴生。

sentences.english: This paper describes the solvent extraction of germanium from the leached solution of uranium- and germanium-containing lignite ash.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了從含鈾鍺褐煤灰的浸出液中萃取鍺的研究。

sentences.english: And this grinding condition is also feasible to other lignite chars.
sentences.chinese: 該球磨條件對其它褐煤半焦同樣適用。

sentences.english: The oil shale associating with lignite formed in Yongning Series of Neozoic.
sentences.chinese: 油頁岩主要賦存於新近系邕寧羣，與褐煤伴生。

sentences.english: An outline of general position on active carbons from lignites is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文概略地介紹了褐煤制活性炭的情況。

sentences.english: Zhaotong lignite is a kind of cherry coal, therefore, its crushing is difficult.
sentences.chinese: 昭通褐煤爲軟褐煤，破碎難度大。

sentences.english: Zhaotong lignite is a kind of cherry coal, therefore, its crushing is difficult.
sentences.chinese: 昭通褐煤爲軟褐煤，破碎難度大。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
